meeting_request.purpose: Need help staying in my history course but feeling overwhelmed
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Marcus, a senior in history. I’ve taken a lot of history courses over the past few years, and I’ve ended up majoring in history. This semester, I’m taking a history of Europe course that I really enjoy, but I’m feeling a bit overwhelmed by the material. My professor has been really helpful, but sometimes it feels like there’s a lot of information to digest, and I just don’t know where to start. I’m also taking a history of the Americas course next semester, and I’m not sure if I should be taking both of those or just focus on one. I’m feeling frustrated and worried that I’m falling behind, and I’m not sure if I’m doing anything wrong or if I should be worried about graduating on time.
